group.label: General Configuration
group.comment:
IMPORTANT - READ THE MANUAL

Don't forget to read this module's manual before using it. Reading the manual will help you a lot in understanding how to configure the module and how it works, in this way, navigating throughout its features will be a lot easier for you.

Enabling this module's features will require for you to enter your API keys, to obtain them you need to log into Bayonet's Console with your Bayonet credentials, once you are logged in, go to the Setup section, where you can get them or generate them if you haven't done that. If you haven't received your Bayonet credentials yet, please send an email to contacto@bayonet.io with your information to provide you with them.

In order to be able to use Bayonet in Live Mode properly, you must add both your IP address and your domain to the whitelist in Bayonet's Console. This is located in the Setup section, the same place where you get your API keys.

If you need any support regarding this module, you can either send a mail to soporte@bayonet.io or contact us via Intercom on our Website.

field.label: Module Enabled
field.comment: When disabled, the module will not process any orders. Can only be enabled when at least one pair is keys has been saved already

field.label: Live (production) Mode Enabled
field.comment: When disabled, the module will process all new orders in sandbox (test) mode. Can only be enabled when both live (production) API keys have been saved already

field.label: API Version
field.comment: The current version of the API. This must not be modified unless asked by the developer
